title: Pyke interactions with bonus health on items?
body:
Hello!

I was just wondering how the calculation works for bonus health on items (like Locket of the Iron Solari or Sterak's Gage). Since his passive converts bonus health to AD, will that mean that the calculation for extra shield amounts on Locket will always end up being zero? Or will the bonus health still apply to items regularly?

replies.body: I would think that it still counts as a bonus health, but its his passive that converts it to the AD. therefore I think that locket would still treat it as if he had the health.
agree killing locket on a support isnt very supporty, im guessing his purpose isnt to really support though.

Pyke is going to be either nerfed massively or buffed massively, in some order.
